title: Emerge - An Artisan Juicery
typeOfFood: Vegan, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: A vegetarian juice bar/restaurant/internet cafe serves raw foods and cold-pressed bioenzymatic juices that are made-in-house to order, all organic and with vegan options. Food includes a raw meatball wrap, a raw veggie wrap, raw pancakes and raw crepes. Baked goods such as coconut bliss balls, chocolate protein cookies and truffle bites are available. Also offers in-house nutrition counseling, cleanses, and seminars. Formerly known as Evolve.
